articles.summary: The global crypto market cap stood at $2.98 trillion on Sunday, down 0.73% over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin held steady above the $95,000 mark, while Etherium hovered above $1,800. With lower timeframes confirming bull signals, another upside move can be in the works for XRP.
